headline: What Recent 38% Rally Means for Las Vegas Sands Valuation in 2025
summary: Thinking about what to do next with Las Vegas Sands stock? You are not alone. Whether you are drawn in by the lights of Las Vegas or the numbers on your brokerage screen, it is hard to ignore a stock that has made such a splash recently. Over just the past three months, shares have surged by 38%. That is a big move for any company, let alone a global casino operator. The one-year total return sits at nearly 39%, showing the rally has not been a short-term affair, and those holding over the...
